**幻觉药水**（potion of hallucination）是[NetHack](/index.php?title=NetHack/zh-CN\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "NetHack/zh-CN (page does not exist)")中的一种[药水](/wiki/%E8%8D%AF%E6%B0%B4 "药水")。

[ ]

## Contents

- [1 生成](#.E7.94.9F.E6.88.90)

- [2 描述](#.E6.8F.8F.E8.BF.B0)

- [3 策略](#.E7.AD.96.E7.95.A5)

- [4 历史](#.E5.8E.86.E5.8F.B2)

- [5 消息](#.E6.B6.88.E6.81.AF)

- [6 Variants](#Variants)

  - [6.1 SLASH'EM](#SLASH.27EM)
  - [6.2 dNetHack](#dNetHack)
  - [6.3 xNetHack](#xNetHack)
  - [6.4 SpliceHack](#SpliceHack)
  - [6.5 notdNetHack](#notdNetHack)
  - [6.6 EvilHack](#EvilHack)
  - [6.7 Hack'EM](#Hack.27EM)

- [7 引用及注释](#.E5.BC.95.E7.94.A8.E5.8F.8A.E6.B3.A8.E9.87.8A)

## 生成

[巫师](/index.php?title=%E5%B7%AB%E5%B8%88\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "巫师 (page does not exist)")开局时获得的随机药水中可能出现幻觉药水[\[1\]](#cite_note-1)。

幻觉药水在随机生成药水中占比1⁄25（4%）。

将[酒](/wiki/%E9%85%92 "酒")与[升级药水](/index.php?title=%E5%8D%87%E7%BA%A7%E8%8D%AF%E6%B0%B4\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "升级药水 (page does not exist)")或[获得能量药水](/wiki/%E8%8E%B7%E5%BE%97%E8%83%BD%E9%87%8F%E8%8D%AF%E6%B0%B4 "获得能量药水")[混合](/index.php?title=%E6%B5%B8\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "浸 (page does not exist)")后会[调制](/index.php?title=%E7%82%BC%E9%87%91%E6%9C%AF\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "炼金术 (page does not exist)")出幻觉药水[\[2\]](#cite_note-2)。

## 描述

- *主条目：[幻觉](/index.php?title=%E5%B9%BB%E8%A7%89\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "幻觉 (page does not exist)")*

[饮用](/index.php?title=%E9%A5%AE%E7%94%A8\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "饮用 (page does not exist)")幻觉药水会对玩家造成持续一段时间的[幻觉](/index.php?title=%E5%B9%BB%E8%A7%89\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "幻觉 (page does not exist)")状态，持续时长取决于药水的[BUC](/index.php?title=BUC/zh-CN\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "BUC/zh-CN (page does not exist)")：受祝福的药水为300–499回合，未诅咒的药水为600–799回合，被诅咒的药水为900–1099回合[\[3\]](#cite_note-3)。将[独角兽的角](/wiki/%E7%8B%AC%E8%A7%92%E5%85%BD%E7%9A%84%E8%A7%92 "独角兽的角")[浸](/index.php?title=%E6%B5%B8\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "浸 (page does not exist)")入幻觉药水会将其转化为未诅咒的[水](/wiki/%E6%B0%B4%EF%BC%88%E8%8D%AF%E6%B0%B4%EF%BC%89 "水（药水）")[\[4\]](#cite_note-4)。

吸入幻觉药水的[蒸汽](/index.php?title=%E8%92%B8%E6%B1%BD\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "蒸汽 (page does not exist)")不会有任何效果，游戏只会输出一条特殊消息，并询问你是否对药水进行类型[命名](/index.php?title=%E5%91%BD%E5%90%8D\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "命名 (page does not exist)")[\[5\]](#cite_note-5)。

怪物无法陷入幻觉状态，因此以幻觉药水击中怪物只会令其陷入[混乱](/index.php?title=%E6%B7%B7%E4%B9%B1\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "混乱 (page does not exist)")状态。怪物不会使用幻觉药水。

将幻觉药水与[治愈](/wiki/%E6%B2%BB%E6%84%88%E8%8D%AF%E6%B0%B4 "治愈药水")、[强力治愈](/wiki/%E5%BC%BA%E5%8A%9B%E6%B2%BB%E6%84%88%E8%8D%AF%E6%B0%B4 "强力治愈药水")或[完全治愈](/wiki/%E5%AE%8C%E5%85%A8%E6%B2%BB%E6%84%88%E8%8D%AF%E6%B0%B4 "完全治愈药水")药水混合会调制出[水](/wiki/%E6%B0%B4%EF%BC%88%E8%8D%AF%E6%B0%B4%EF%BC%89 "水（药水）")。

*以下内容涉及即将到来的版本（[NetHack 3.7.0](/wiki/NetHack_3.7.0 "NetHack 3.7.0")）之信息。如果该版本已发布，请验证此处信息是否准确，并作出相应修改，以将其并入页面。*

现在饮用非诅咒的幻觉药水可能会获得一次[启蒙](/index.php?title=%E5%90%AF%E8%92%99\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "启蒙 (page does not exist)")并[锻炼](/index.php?title=%E9%94%BB%E7%82%BC\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "锻炼 (page does not exist)")[感知](/index.php?title=%E6%84%9F%E7%9F%A5\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "感知 (page does not exist)")，该效果可能被[幻觉抵抗](/index.php?title=%E5%B9%BB%E8%A7%89%E6%8A%B5%E6%8A%97\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "幻觉抵抗 (page does not exist)")阻止。祝福的药水给予启蒙的概率是4⁄9，未诅咒的药水则是1⁄6。

## 策略

幻觉药水的应用率较低，因为游戏中能使怪物混乱的可靠手段很多，直接饮用幻觉药水也没什么好处，因此幻觉药水主要作为[稀释](/wiki/%E7%A8%80%E9%87%8A "稀释")的对象。不过，幻觉药水在少数情况下还是有用的：在幻觉状态下被[死亡之触](/index.php?title=%E6%AD%BB%E4%BA%A1%E4%B9%8B%E8%A7%A6\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "死亡之触 (page does not exist)")命中不会受到即死效果。如果你在没有[魔法抵抗](/index.php?title=%E9%AD%94%E6%B3%95%E6%8A%B5%E6%8A%97\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "魔法抵抗 (page does not exist)")的情况下遇到了高等级的施法怪物的话，幻觉药水很可能救你一命。

## 历史

幻觉药水最初于[NetHack 1.3d](/wiki/NetHack_1.3d "NetHack 1.3d")加入游戏。

## 消息

- 哇！一切<看起来/感觉>都在无边变化！（Oh wow! Everything \<looks/feels> so cosmic!）

  你喝下了幻觉药水，进入了幻觉状态。若你同时处于[失明](/index.php?title=%E5%A4%B1%E6%98%8E\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "失明 (page does not exist)")状态，则该消息会使用“感觉”一词。

- 你眼前浮现了短暂的异象。（You have a momentary vision.）

  你吸入了幻觉药水的蒸汽。

## Variants

**此条目或段落的部分内容需要翻译。**  
您可以帮助我们[**翻译此页面**](https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=Potion_of_hallucination/zh-CN\&action=edit)，但**请勿使用机器翻译**。

### SLASH'EM

In [SLASH'EM](/wiki/SLASH%27EM "SLASH'EM"), the [Lawful Quest](/wiki/Lawful_Quest "Lawful Quest") has a 2⁄5 chance of generating a cursed potion of hallucination within the Chamber of Junk.

Hallucination in SLASH'EM also distorts items in the hero's inventory and on their square are standing on, which makes randomly quaffing potions far more hazardous; additionally, it is still only a minor problem in the eyes of their [deity](/wiki/Deity "Deity"). Be sure to have the inventory letter of your remedy memorized: in addition to unicorn horns and potions of extra healing or full healing, [medical kits](/wiki/Medical_kit "Medical kit") can also cure hallucination, though their reliability depends heavily on the hero's role.

The potion of hallucination also has a less fringe benefit: asking a shopkeeper to [uncurse an item](/wiki/Shopkeeper_services#Uncursing "Shopkeeper services") while hallucinating has a chance of [blessing](/wiki/Bless "Bless") it instead, providing a means of doing so without breaking [atheist](/wiki/Atheist "Atheist") conduct.

All of the above information also applies to [SlashTHEM](/wiki/SlashTHEM "SlashTHEM").

### dNetHack

In [dNetHack](/wiki/DNetHack "DNetHack"), the potion of hallucination has some additional possible effects: hallucinating while eating a corpse that grants telepathy adds a point of [insight](/wiki/Insight "Insight"), while quaffing a cursed potion of hallucination reduces the hero's insight by one point. As with SLASH'EM, requesting the item-uncursing service while hallucinating may also cause the item to be blessed instead.

The closet behind the hidden door in the home level of the [Madman quest](/wiki/Madman_quest "Madman quest") has a potion of hallucination in its pile of items.

### xNetHack

In [xNetHack](/wiki/XNetHack "XNetHack"), [the Oracle](/wiki/Oracle_\(monster\) "Oracle (monster)") has a 2⁄3 chance of [generating with](/wiki/Monster_starting_inventory "Monster starting inventory") a potion of hallucination.

Drinking a non-cursed potion of hallucination may grant [enlightenment](/wiki/Enlightenment "Enlightenment") alongside hallucination, which is blocked by sources of hallucination resistance (i.e. wielding Grayswandir); this exercises [wisdom](/wiki/Wisdom "Wisdom") and has a 4⁄9 chance of occurring when quaffing a blessed potion, or a 1⁄6 chance when quaffing an uncursed potion.

### SpliceHack

In [SpliceHack](/wiki/SpliceHack "SpliceHack"), the [extraplanar merchants](/wiki/Extraplanar_merchant "Extraplanar merchant") in the [City of Brass](/wiki/City_of_Brass "City of Brass") have a 1⁄2 chance of generating with a potion of hallucination among their additional items.

### notdNetHack

In [notdNetHack](/wiki/NotdNetHack "NotdNetHack") and [notnotdNetHack](/wiki/NotnotdNetHack "NotnotdNetHack"), in addition to dNetHack details, the vapors from a broken potion of hallucination cause hallucination for 2-6 turns.

### EvilHack

In [EvilHack](/wiki/EvilHack "EvilHack"), [intelligent](/wiki/Intelligent "Intelligent") monsters can be generated with the potion of hallucination as an [offensive item](/wiki/Offensive_item "Offensive item"), and will throw them at the hero if possible.

### Hack'EM

In [Hack'EM](/wiki/Hack%27EM "Hack'EM"), the Oracle has a 2⁄3 chance of generating with a potion of hallucination as in xNetHack.

Quaffing the potion of hallucination also behaves as it does in xNetHack; intelligent monsters can generate with the potion of hallucination as an offensive item and will throw them at the hero if possible, as in EvilHack.

4. [↑](#cite_ref-4) [src/potion.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 1817](https://github.com/NetHack/NetHack/blob/NetHack-3.6.7_Released/src/potion.c#L1817)

幻觉药水（potion of hallucination）是NetHack中的一种药水。

Contents

生成

巫师开局时获得的随机药水中可能出现幻觉药水[1]。

幻觉药水在随机生成药水中占比1⁄25（4%）。

将酒与升级药水或获得能量药水混合后会调制出幻觉药水[2]。

描述

主条目：幻觉

饮用幻觉药水会对玩家造成持续一段时间的幻觉状态，持续时长取决于药水的BUC：受祝福的药水为300–499回合，未诅咒的药水为600–799回合，被诅咒的药水为900–1099回合[3]。将独角兽的角浸入幻觉药水会将其转化为未诅咒的水[4]。

吸入幻觉药水的蒸汽不会有任何效果，游戏只会输出一条特殊消息，并询问你是否对药水进行类型命名[5]。

怪物无法陷入幻觉状态，因此以幻觉药水击中怪物只会令其陷入混乱状态。怪物不会使用幻觉药水。

将幻觉药水与治愈、强力治愈或完全治愈药水混合会调制出水。

以下内容涉及即将到来的版本（NetHack 3.7.0）之信息。如果该版本已发布，请验证此处信息是否准确，并作出相应修改，以将其并入页面。

现在饮用非诅咒的幻觉药水可能会获得一次启蒙并锻炼感知，该效果可能被幻觉抵抗阻止。祝福的药水给予启蒙的概率是4⁄9，未诅咒的药水则是1⁄6。

策略

幻觉药水的应用率较低，因为游戏中能使怪物混乱的可靠手段很多，直接饮用幻觉药水也没什么好处，因此幻觉药水主要作为稀释的对象。不过，幻觉药水在少数情况下还是有用的：在幻觉状态下被死亡之触命中不会受到即死效果。如果你在没有魔法抵抗的情况下遇到了高等级的施法怪物的话，幻觉药水很可能救你一命。

历史

幻觉药水最初于NetHack 1.3d加入游戏。

消息

哇！一切<看起来/感觉>都在无边变化！（Oh wow! Everything <looks/feels> so cosmic!）
你喝下了幻觉药水，进入了幻觉状态。若你同时处于失明状态，则该消息会使用“感觉”一词。
你眼前浮现了短暂的异象。（You have a momentary vision.）
你吸入了幻觉药水的蒸汽。

Variants

您可以帮助我们翻译此页面，但请勿使用机器翻译。

SLASH'EM

In SLASH'EM, the Lawful Quest has a 2⁄5 chance of generating a cursed potion of hallucination within the Chamber of Junk.

Hallucination in SLASH'EM also distorts items in the hero's inventory and on their square are standing on, which makes randomly quaffing potions far more hazardous; additionally, it is still only a minor problem in the eyes of their deity. Be sure to have the inventory letter of your remedy memorized: in addition to unicorn horns and potions of extra healing or full healing, medical kits can also cure hallucination, though their reliability depends heavily on the hero's role.

The potion of hallucination also has a less fringe benefit: asking a shopkeeper to uncurse an item while hallucinating has a chance of blessing it instead, providing a means of doing so without breaking atheist conduct.

All of the above information also applies to SlashTHEM.

dNetHack

In dNetHack, the potion of hallucination has some additional possible effects: hallucinating while eating a corpse that grants telepathy adds a point of insight, while quaffing a cursed potion of hallucination reduces the hero's insight by one point. As with SLASH'EM, requesting the item-uncursing service while hallucinating may also cause the item to be blessed instead.

The closet behind the hidden door in the home level of the Madman quest has a potion of hallucination in its pile of items.

xNetHack

In xNetHack, the Oracle has a 2⁄3 chance of generating with a potion of hallucination.

Drinking a non-cursed potion of hallucination may grant enlightenment alongside hallucination, which is blocked by sources of hallucination resistance (i.e. wielding Grayswandir); this exercises wisdom and has a 4⁄9 chance of occurring when quaffing a blessed potion, or a 1⁄6 chance when quaffing an uncursed potion.

SpliceHack

In SpliceHack, the extraplanar merchants in the City of Brass have a 1⁄2 chance of generating with a potion of hallucination among their additional items.

notdNetHack

In notdNetHack and notnotdNetHack, in addition to dNetHack details, the vapors from a broken potion of hallucination cause hallucination for 2-6 turns.

Quaffing the potion of hallucination also behaves as it does in xNetHack; intelligent monsters can generate with the potion of hallucination as an offensive item and will throw them at the hero if possible, as in EvilHack.

'''幻觉药水'''（potion of hallucination）是{{cnlink|NetHack}}中的一种[[药水]]。

== 生成 ==
[[巫师]]开局时获得的随机药水中可能出现幻觉药水{{refsrc|src/u_init.c|166|nethack=3.6.7}}。

== 描述 ==
{{main/zh-CN|幻觉}}
[[饮用]]幻觉药水会对玩家造成持续一段时间的[[幻觉]]状态，持续时长取决于药水的{{cnlink|BUC}}：受祝福的药水为{{rn1|200|300}}回合，未诅咒的药水为{{rn1|200|600}}回合，被诅咒的药水为{{rn1|200|900}}回合{{refsrc|src/potion.c|636|nethack=3.6.7}}。将[[独角兽的角]][[浸]]入幻觉药水会将其转化为未诅咒的{{! of/zh-CN|水}}{{refsrc|src/potion.c|1817|nethack=3.6.7}}。

吸入幻觉药水的[[蒸汽]]不会有任何效果，游戏只会输出一条特殊消息，并询问你是否对药水进行类型[[命名]]{{refsrc|src/potion.c|1697|nethack=3.6.7}}。

怪物无法陷入幻觉状态，因此以幻觉药水击中怪物只会令其陷入[[混乱]]状态。怪物不会使用幻觉药水。

将幻觉药水与{{! of/zh-CN|治愈|强力治愈|or=1|完全治愈}}药水混合会调制出[[水（药水）|水]]。

{{upcoming/zh-CN|NetHack 3.7.0|现在饮用非诅咒的幻觉药水可能会获得一次[[启蒙]]并[[锻炼]][[感知]]，该效果可能被[[幻觉抵抗]]阻止。祝福的药水给予启蒙的概率是{{frac|4|9}}，未诅咒的药水则是{{frac|6}}。}}

== 策略 ==
幻觉药水的应用率较低，因为游戏中能使怪物混乱的可靠手段很多，直接饮用幻觉药水也没什么好处，因此幻觉药水主要作为[[稀释]]的对象。不过，幻觉药水在少数情况下还是有用的：在幻觉状态下被[[死亡之触]]命中不会受到即死效果。如果你在没有[[魔法抵抗]]的情况下遇到了高等级的施法怪物的话，幻觉药水很可能救你一命。

== 历史 ==
幻觉药水最初于[[NetHack 1.3d]]加入游戏。

== 消息 ==
{{message/zh-CN|哇！一切<看起来/感觉>都在无边变化！|你喝下了幻觉药水，进入了幻觉状态。若你同时处于[[失明]]状态，则该消息会使用“感觉”一词。|Oh wow! Everything <looks/feels> so cosmic!}}
{{message/zh-CN|你眼前浮现了短暂的异象。|你吸入了幻觉药水的蒸汽。|You have a momentary vision.}}

==Variants==
{{translation/zh-CN|n}}
===SLASH'EM===
In [[SLASH'EM]], the [[Lawful Quest]] has a {{frac|2|5}} chance of generating a cursed potion of hallucination within the Chamber of Junk.

Hallucination in SLASH'EM also distorts items in the hero's inventory and on their square are standing on, which makes randomly quaffing potions far more hazardous; additionally, it is still only a minor problem in the eyes of their [[deity]]. Be sure to have the inventory letter of your remedy memorized: in addition to unicorn horns and potions of extra healing or full healing, [[medical kit]]s can also cure hallucination, though their reliability depends heavily on the hero's role.

The potion of hallucination also has a less fringe benefit: asking a shopkeeper to [[Shopkeeper services#Uncursing|uncurse an item]] while hallucinating has a chance of [[bless]]ing it instead, providing a means of doing so without breaking [[atheist]] conduct.

All of the above information also applies to [[SlashTHEM]].

===dNetHack===
In [[dNetHack]], the potion of hallucination has some additional possible effects: hallucinating while eating a corpse that grants telepathy adds a point of [[insight]], while quaffing a cursed potion of hallucination reduces the hero's insight by one point. As with SLASH'EM, requesting the item-uncursing service while hallucinating may also cause the item to be blessed instead.

The closet behind the hidden door in the home level of the [[Madman quest]] has a potion of hallucination in its pile of items.

===xNetHack===
In [[xNetHack]], [[Oracle (monster)|the Oracle]] has a {{frac|2|3}} chance of [[Monster starting inventory|generating with]] a potion of hallucination.

Drinking a non-cursed potion of hallucination may grant [[enlightenment]] alongside hallucination, which is blocked by sources of hallucination resistance (i.e. wielding Grayswandir); this exercises [[wisdom]] and has a {{frac|4|9}} chance of occurring when quaffing a blessed potion, or a {{frac|6}} chance when quaffing an uncursed potion.

===SpliceHack===
In [[SpliceHack]], the [[extraplanar merchant]]s in the [[City of Brass]] have a {{frac|2}} chance of generating with a potion of hallucination among their additional items.

===notdNetHack===
In [[notdNetHack]] and [[notnotdNetHack]], in addition to dNetHack details, the vapors from a broken potion of hallucination cause hallucination for 2-6 turns.

===EvilHack===
In [[EvilHack]], [[intelligent]] monsters can be generated with the potion of hallucination as an [[offensive item]], and will throw them at the hero if possible.

===Hack'EM===
In [[Hack'EM]], the Oracle has a {{frac|2|3}} chance of generating with a potion of hallucination as in xNetHack.

Quaffing the potion of hallucination also behaves as it does in xNetHack; intelligent monsters can generate with the potion of hallucination as an offensive item and will throw them at the hero if possible, as in EvilHack.
